I am a Statistics student at the Federal University of Paraná (UFPR). I am deeply passionate about developing statistical concepts and transforming raw data into valuable insights.
With a bachelor’s degree in Accounting from the University of West Santa Catarina (UNOESC), I possess the skill to translate numbers into compelling narratives. Specializing in providing in-depth reports detailing financial and operational impacts, I offer users profound insights that drive decision-making.


SKILLS

 Power BI
 R
 Python
 SQL
 Machine Learning
 Alteryx

title: Raymundo Eduardo Pilz
text:
My name is Nick Lyon (they / them) and I am an early career data scientist with experience managing and analyzing scientific data in a range of formats. I’m also a passionate educator (certified as an instructor by The Carpentries) and thoroughly enjoy chances to teach and learn with audiences of all levels of prior experience. I firmly believe in transparency in data management and am an avid git user. Check out my  GitHub profile for examples of my work!


 Coding –  Ecology –  Reading –  Photography –  Teaching –  Dungeons & Dragons –  Botany –  Birding
